deletionConstraints.customMessage: Important settings item cannot be deleted.

description:
Showcase of a Custom Deletion-Validator executed in the cluster.

It will make sure that important items are not deleted.

For the Java implementation check out [ExampleDeletionValidatorSchema.java](https://bitbucket.lab.dynatrace.org/projects/RX/repos/cluster/browse/shared/settings.monitoring.impl/src/main/java/com/dynatrace/settings/monitoring/impl/internalapi/schemas/customvalidation/ExampleDeletionValidatorSchema.java)
